not even close...pretty much every magic resist item royally messes with any magic damage received or the core items of magic pen

450 gold negates over 2000 gold of magic pen and you don't even have to compromise your build to include it

tanks have limited options based on what type of play style they have {{item:3194}} {{item:3083}} {{item:3065}} but that is the go to mr options a tank has unless they can use the other option of {{item:3091}} or {{item:3001}} other than that its not efficient to build the other mr options which tend to revolve around support items while mages have the ability to do percent health damage {{item:3151}}  while getting health and ap along with more damage passive. then we have {{item:3165}} which for some reason gives hp magic pen magic andddd healing reduction which negates all counter magic items becasue for some reason they are all based on hp regen. and then we have {{item:3135}}  which for some reason has a higher pen over last whisper.

{{item:3111}}  {{item:3065}}  = 80 MR which with their own magic resist, halves magic damage. getting anything other than that is overkill unless your opponents are heavily fed or deal a lot of magic damage.  The same can be said if you go for {{item:3047}}  with {{item:3065}} and a different MR item even if it's just {{item:1033}} 

{{item:3083}}  is also not an MR item, it's a health and regen item

if your champion has no method of sustain, {{item:3001}}  can replace {{item:3065}} .  On a traditional tank, if the game lasts long enough, you can even go both and be basically un-touchable for magic damage

If you're a juggernaut, you basically only need {{item:3065}}  due to your innate sustain but it never hurts to have more, especially against a comp that favors magic damage

{{item:3165}}  + {{item:3020}}  = 33 magic pen, costs 4100

{{item:3916}}  + {{item:3020}}  =  33 magic pen, costs 2600

{{item:1033}} = 25 magic resist, cost 450.  

for the price of 450 gold, you've outed them of 1412 gold (cutting out the movement speed and 20 ability power), removing 75.75% of the value of their magic pen

Magic resist is not weak, **PEOPLE ARE NOT BUYING MAGIC RESIST**

there is a big difference

#now, why are they not buying magic resist?  AD-threats are far more valuable and common
